channel.title: NukeRune [317 Delta] Yell Crownr REP+++
channel.description:
Do Any One Know How To Add Crowns In Yell Delta... <img=1>, <img=2> And <img=3> Doesnt Works REP+++ If You Can Send Me The Code To Open The Command As I Opened The Yell Colour Thanks!
-Pax

item.title: NukeRune [317 Delta] Yell Crownr REP+++
item.dc:creator: @pax_magenz pax magenz
item.description:
@pax_magenz wrote:

[quote=“heatrn11, post:8, topic:440827”][quote author=pax magenz link=topic=543500.msg3985837#msg3985837 date=1335859280]

Pax, I think he means something like this: if (playerRights == 1) {titles = "@cr1@[Moderator]@cr@-";}
@cr1@ = crown 1
@cr2@ = crown 2 etc…

Just try what you think it is

that doesnt works, anyways u have scammed me -.- give me my money back now
[/quote]
So looks like you have more money then brains XD. @cr1@ is the player mod and this a free forum you don’t pay for people to fix your server/client.[/quote]
i meen on rs he scammed me 10M, btw only @cr1@ not @cr@? or @bla@? cause that doesnt works ;S

Read full topic

item.title: NukeRune [317 Delta] Yell Crownr REP+++
item.dc:creator: @pax_magenz pax magenz
item.description:
@pax_magenz wrote:

sebblol:

in delta it should be @cr@ not

more basic where do i put it?

[code] if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “”;
if (playerRights == 0) {
titles = “[Player]-”;
}
if (donator == 1) {
titles = “@gre@[Donator]@bla@-”;
}
if (playerRights == 1) {
titles = “@blu@[Moderator]@bla@-”;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")) {
titles = “[Head Mod]-”;
}
if (playerRights == 2) {
titles = “@yel@[Administrator]@bla@-”;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")) {
titles = “[Head Admin]-”;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")) {
titles = “@red@[Co-Owner]@bla@-”;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“pax”)) {
titles = “@red@[Owner]@bla@-”;
}
yell(titles + “” + playerName + ": "

  • command.substring(5));[/code]

Read full topic
